attributes.action: keep oral examinations an important part of foreign language learning.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following the annoucement that oral examinations could be scrapped because they are "too stressful" 

The ability to speak another language is probably the most important skill to aquire and the most useful skill to have when one is abroad (e.g. on holiday)

Language learning in Britian needs to be encouraged but not by "dumbing down". We need able linguists to enable Britian to be in the driving seat of Europe and also a important player in international business.
